audioText: Demain, je resterai à la maison pour finir mon projet d'art numérique.
question: What will the speaker do tomorrow?
options: Stay home to finish a digital art project.
Go out to buy art supplies.
explanation: The text states 'Demain, je resterai à la maison pour finir mon projet d'art numérique' - Tomorrow, I will stay home to finish my digital art project. 'Resterai' is the future form of 'rester' (to stay/remain), first person singular.
